summary: An ordinance accepting an easement for sewer purposes, from Great Western Realty Co. Inc., over portions of vacated East 113th Street adjoining the west 123 feet of Lot 7, Block 9, Minnie L. Kraus' Subdivision of Blocks 1 and 9, and portion of Blocks 2, 8, 10, 17 and 18, Plat of Lake Side City Addition, and abandoning a previously granted easement for sewer purposes over said vacated East 113th Street, and disclaiming any title, interest or right of user acquired by said easement.
